00020 TreeLibraryCtrl::TreeLibraryCtrl(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id)
00021 {
00022         Create(parent, id, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxTR_DEFAULT_STYLE, wxDefaultValidator, wxT("TreeControl"));
00023 
00024         m_currentTreeID = 0;
00025 
00026         // connects menu with OnMenu
00027         Connect(wxID_ANY, wxEVT_COMMAND_TREE_ITEM_MENU,(wxObjectEventFunction)&TreeLibraryCtrl::OnItemMenu);
00028 
00029         // connects double-click with OnItemActivated
00030         Connect(wxID_ANY, wxEVT_COMMAND_TREE_ITEM_ACTIVATED, (wxObjectEventFunction)&TreeLibraryCtrl::OnItemActivated);
00031 
00032         // connects delete with OnDelete
00033         Connect(idMenuDelete,wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,(wxObjectEventFunction)&TreeLibraryCtrl::OnDelete);
00034 
00035         // connects newCat with OnNewCategory
00036         Connect(idMenuCreateCat,wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,(wxObjectEventFunction)&TreeLibraryCtrl::OnNewCategory);
00037 
00038         // connects export with OnExport
00039         Connect(idMenuExport,wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,(wxObjectEventFunction)&TreeLibraryCtrl::OnExport);
00040 
00041         // connects pase with OnPaste
00042         Connect(idMenuPaste,wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,(wxObjectEventFunction)&TreeLibraryCtrl::OnPaste);
00043 
00044         // connects rename with OnMenuRename
00045         Connect(idMenuRename,wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,(wxObjectEventFunction)&TreeLibraryCtrl::OnMenuRename);
00046 }

00053 void TreeLibraryCtrl::showMenu(wxTreeItemId id, const wxPoint& pt, bool cat)
00054 {
00055         // create dropdown-menu
00056         wxMenu menu(GetItemText(id));
00057 
00058         // check if category or assembly
00059         if (cat)
00060         {
00061                 // menu for categories
00062                 menu.Append(idMenuCreateCat, wxT("&Neue Kategorie"));
00063                 menu.Append(idMenuDelete, wxT("&L\u00F6schen"));
00064                 menu.Append(idMenuRename, wxT("Umbenennen"));
00065         }
00066         else
00067         {
00068                 // menu for assemblies
00069                 menu.Append(idMenuPaste, wxT("&Einf\u00FCgen"));
00070                 menu.Append(idMenuDelete, wxT("&L\u00F6schen"));
00071                 menu.Append(idMenuRename, wxT("Umbenennen"));
00072                 menu.AppendSeparator();
00073                 menu.Append(idMenuExport, wxT("E&xportieren"));
00074         }
00075 
00076         // show menu
00077         PopupMenu(&menu, pt);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void TreeLibraryCtrl::OnItemMenu(wxTreeEvent& event)
00081 {
00082         m_currentTreeID = event.GetItem();
00083 
00084         TreeLibraryItemData* item = (TreeLibraryItemData*)GetItemData(m_currentTreeID);
00085 
00086         if (item != NULL)
00087         {
00088                 wxPoint clientpt = event.GetPoint();
00089                 showMenu(m_currentTreeID, clientpt, item->getCat());
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void TreeLibraryCtrl::OnDelete(wxTreeEvent& event)
00094 {
00095         // create event
00096         TreeControlEvent gnr(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);
00097 
00098         // set event type
00099         gnr.setEventType(LIBRARYDELETE);
00100 
00101         // set name
00102         TreeLibraryItemData* item = (TreeLibraryItemData*)GetItemData(m_currentTreeID);
00103         gnr.SetString(item->getName());
00104 
00105         // set cat
00106         gnr.setCat(item->getCat());
00107 
00108         // fire event
00109         ProcessEvent(gnr);
00110 }
00111 
00112 void TreeLibraryCtrl::OnNewCategory(wxTreeEvent& event)
00113 {
00114         wxTextEntryDialog ted(this, wxT("Name der neuen Kategorie."));
00115 
00116         if (ted.ShowModal() == wxID_CANCEL)
00117         {
00118                 // if pressed cancel, do nothing
00119                 return;
00120         }
00121 
00122         // create event
00123         TreeControlEvent gnr(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);
00124 
00125         // set event type
00126         gnr.setEventType(LIBRARYNEWCAT);
00127 
00128         // set name
00129         TreeLibraryItemData* item = (TreeLibraryItemData*)GetItemData(m_currentTreeID);
00130         gnr.SetString(item->getName());
00131 
00132         // set name of new category
00133         gnr.setNewName(ted.GetValue());
00134 
00135         // fire event
00136         ProcessEvent(gnr);
00137 }

00171 void TreeLibraryCtrl::OnMenuRename(wxTreeEvent& event)
00172 {
00173         // create event
00174         TreeControlEvent gnr(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);
00175 
00176         // set name
00177         TreeLibraryItemData* item = (TreeLibraryItemData*)GetItemData(m_currentTreeID);
00178         gnr.SetString(item->getName());
00179 
00180         // set cat
00181         gnr.setCat(item->getCat());
00182 
00183         // entry dialog
00184         wxTextEntryDialog ted(this, wxT("Neuer Name:"));
00185 
00186         if (ted.ShowModal() == wxID_CANCEL)
00187         {
00188                 // if pressed cancel, do nothing
00189                 return;
00190         }
00191 
00192         // set event type
00193         gnr.setEventType(LIBRARYMENURENAME);
00194 
00195         if (ted.GetValue().IsEmpty())
00196         {
00197                 // set new name
00198                 gnr.setNewName(wxT("neu"));
00199         }
00200         else
00201         {
00202                 // set new name
00203                 gnr.setNewName(ted.GetValue());
00204         }
00205 
00206         // fire event
00207         ProcessEvent(gnr);
00208 }
00209 
00210 void TreeLibraryCtrl::OnItemActivated(wxTreeEvent& event)
00211 {
00212         m_currentTreeID = event.GetItem();
00213 
00214         TreeLibraryItemData* treeItemData = (TreeLibraryItemData*)GetItemData(m_currentTreeID);
00215 
00216         if (treeItemData != NULL && treeItemData->getCat() == false)
00217         {
00218                 OnPaste(event);
00219         }
00220 }
